Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and greyish in section, the interior is ribbed, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thot 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394972) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394972)
